message.body: I forgot my concert attire! Thats what i was missing, can you bring my black suit from my closet?
Sorry i cant be there tonight, :-(. I hope you're enjoying your night
What time is the concert tonight? What building is it in?
830, in the concert hall(upstairs of the same building the dance was in. Can you bring ny black leather shoes too? Teyre either on the shelf on top of my dresser or in one of the big tupperwares
I'm leaving at 7 so I get there with enough time for you to put on your suit and get ready.
